reviews.review:
September 1st, 2019, I bought half life 2 game due to hearing good reviews and a friend that I’ve know for a year now recommended me it. I really enjoyed it and decided to get the first game (yes I played the 2nd game before the first game). If anything, I can give pros and cons but firstly, I wanna say how different the look is compared to HL2 even by just 6 years. Crazy to think that half life 2 is a game from 2004. 

Pros:
The game has an interesting story to it and some areas look fantastic 
I like how the game isn’t just about shooting monsters but there is also strategy to it though I haven’t played many shooting games so this could be normal.
Getting to Xen was AMAZING and it looked beautiful.
Some weapons were fun to use lol.

Cons:
Some enemies like the vortigaunts and the end game boss did a hell of ton of damage and it was annoying especially since for the majority I was playing on normal mode.
The end game boss is really frustrating, I get it’s suppose to be hard but still it takes awhile.
Some AI glitches


Overall, even though I wasn’t born into the half life era, the game is really enjoyable even in 2020. Hopefully valve decides to make half life 3, though let’s be grateful that alyx is on production lol.

The original, classic, Half-Life 1. An absolutely fantastic game that I have played through many times. I highly recommend it, and each and every one of the other Half-Life games.

This game uses GoldSrc. GoldSrc is the precursor to the Source engine which powers games like Portal 2, CS:GO and many other Valve games. As such, the graphics are... limited. However, this should NOT be a dealbreaker. The story is awesome, and the next games are even better than this one. Give this one a try. You won't regret it.
This game is better with mods. Personally i would like to work for black mesa.
This game is so well designed that I barely noticed how dated the graphics were.
c'est half life gros bien sur c'est bien
Just a fantastic game,. Really good story, game physics that aren't too limiting but aren't game breaking, and enjoyable graphics for its time.

Le doy recomendado debido a que me gusto el juego pero me paso un bug que hace que todos los npc se mueran por que el guardia del principio muere luego algunos cientificos y el guardia que me tiene que activar el ascensor se muere por lo tanto es imposible seguir el juego si alguien sabe la solucion y lo podria comentar se lo agradecere mucho

Buggy as all hell.
don't dare stand near anything at any point.
near a wall during an explosion or any event or even randomly? you're stuck in the wall now.
lost count of the number of times I've ran into an object and became entirely stuck for no reason.
I'm not running any mods or anything like that.
Don't waste your money.
One of the best and most classic FPS games from the 90s

I put a gun to your head, and ask[i] "Have you played 1998's Critically-Acclaimed First-Person Shooter, Half-Life?" [/i]

The end.

这是一款在游戏历史上创造又一巅峰的奇迹。科幻、异形、故事、射击，这些令人听到就已然心潮澎湃的Tag融合进一个FPS游戏，直到现在也是难以逾越的。用“叹为观止、登峰造极、素吧啦戏”这类陈词滥调来形容的作品令人惊讶地少，但《Half-Life》绝对是这些作品的其中之一。科技的发展导致量的叠加，固然会带来质的突破；3D技术的不断发展和进步，人们对游戏的不断改观，历史上总得有这么一款游戏会是里程碑般的存在，它代表的是这几十年游戏艰难发展的心路历程，是捅破“质”的那一把金色利刃。令人欣慰的是1998年《Half-Life》的出现，让它当仁不让地坐上这个王座。它的艺术造诣和存在价值是无法被颠覆和超越的，它所开创的，不仅仅是一个新世界的大门这么简单。

В это играть надо! Если ты уважаешь игровую индустрию! Это классика блять! 
Сколько шутеров сделано после этой игры?! Сколько шутеров, скотина блять!?
An absolute classic. I would wholeheartedly recommend despite it's flaws.
Un clásico, lo que tiene de viejo lo tiene de bueno.

Порнография! Может для людей старше меня, которые играли в нее в свои годы - это шедевр, но для меня нет.
Не судите строго, я знаю что игра была крутой, и оказала там какие-то влияния на индустрию игр.. туда сюда и все такое.

И все-таки, я уважаю серию игр.
Very good game for 1998. good story, a good set of items and terrifying enemies

игра, хоть и достаточно стара, но имеет просторы для развития в дезматче и спидранах, сам сюжет проходится часов за 15-20 если играть впервые сам сюжет абсолютно точно не плох, есть достаточно много модов, несколько из которых можно скачать прямо в стиме, игра имеет не самую убогую графику для своих лет, поддерживает большинство современных разрешений, не уверен разве что в 21:9, хорошая физика и звуковое сопровождение обеспечат вам часов 50 на прохождение сюжета, перепрохождения на харде и игры в онлайне и в моды

The original HL. One of the best FPSs ever.
Absolute classic. If you don't have it then you need it.

The graphics migth be outdated but it's still one of the best shooter games out there.

Half-Life es en definitiva un clásico de Valve, en el cual eres Gordon Freeman, un físico teorico y un empleado en Black Mesa, el cual tiene que sobrevivir y ayudar a la raza humana de unos extraterrestres que llegan a la tierra después de que una catástrofe ocurre ahí. 

Recomiendo mucho este juego, y claro, todas sus expansiones, este es sin lugar a duda uno de mis juegos favoritos.

Old but Gold! Challenging & intriguing map puzzle layouts that command thoughtful player interaction, combined with a satisfying unique weapon arsenal & enemies make this classic stand strong for the ages!
Una jugabilidad adictiva, recomendable para iniciar en el mundo de los shooters <3

It's a classic. No more needs to be said.

Ist ein Classic und must have. Macht auch heute noch Spaß
首先说一下 玩这个游戏就是怀旧。不然是不会买的。游戏性特别好，故事也是比较有意思的。就是bug有点多，有些地方卡到里面就会游戏弹出。毕竟是比较老的游戏了，V社有空更新就好。

A classic title, and quite a lengthy one. Well worth any price. I enjoy the scientific accuracy that is present, there is great challenge present, and the environments are unforgettable. If you want a break from mainstream AAA cookie cutter games, take a step back into the 90s with Half Life!

solo lo llegue a jugar por steam 3 hrs ya que este juego formo parte de mi infancia, esas 3 hrs las jugue estando en la universidad, pero desde primaria lo llegue a jugar, primero viendo como mi papá lo jugaba y luego tener la oportunidad de pasarlo por mi mismo, me atrapo, la historia, jugabilidad, dificultad, todo fue excelente, es 100% recomendable, para un clasico como lo es Age Of Empire 2, para mi es una joya de juego, half life, blue shift, oppsing force, el 2, capitulo uno y capitulo dos son unas verdaderas joyas!!

asi que si, lo recomiendo al 100% yo sigo fiel a que algun dia sacaran half life 3, tal vez eso nunca pasa pero se vale soñar, el poder jugar half life 3.
An absolute classic. an FPS game to define all FPS games
